data.lyric:
[ti:peace (Explicit)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:folklore]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]peace (Explicit) - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:01.06]Written by：Taylor Swift/Aaron Dessner
[00:02.13]© 2020 TASRM Publishing, administered by：Songs Of Universal, Inc. (BMI), Ingrid Stella Music, administered by SonyATV Tunes LLC (ASCAP)
[00:03.19]All Rights Reserved. Used by Permission.
[00:03.81]Produced by：Aaron Dessner
[00:04.22]Recorded by：Aaron Dessner and Jonathan Low at Long Pond (Hudson Valley, NY)
[00:05.57]Vocals recorded by：Laura Sisk at the Kitty Committee Studio (Los Angeles, CA)
[00:06.91]Mixed by：Jonathan Low at Long Pond (Hudson Valley, NY)
[00:07.94]Mastered by：Randy Merrill at Sterling Sound (New York, NY)
[00:08.97]Bass, Piano, Synthesizer, Field Recording, Mellotron and Drone by：Aaron Dessner (Hudson Valley, NY)
[00:10.41]Pulse by：Justin Vernon (April Base; Fall Creek, WI) recorded by Justin Vernon
[00:12.43]
[00:42.43]Our coming of age has come and gone
[00:45.07]
[00:45.96]Suddenly this summer it's clear
[00:49.06]I never had the courage of my convictions
[00:52.68]As long as danger is near
[00:55.81]And it's just around the corner darling
[00:59.34]Cause it lives in me
[01:02.21]No I could never give you peace
[01:13.99]But I'm a fire and I'll keep your brittle heart warm
[01:17.40]If your cascade ocean wave blues come
[01:20.64]All these people think love's for show
[01:22.66]But I would die for you in secret
[01:25.52]The devil's in the details
[01:27.42]But you got a friend in me
[01:32.70]Would it be enough
[01:33.94]If I could never give you peace
[01:39.87]Your integrity makes me seem small
[01:43.29]You paint dreamscapes on the wall
[01:46.92]I talk sh*t with my friends
[01:49.24]It's like I'm wasting your honor
[02:03.71]And you know that I'd
[02:07.82]Swing with you for the fences
[02:10.98]Sit with you in the trenches
[02:14.68]Give you my wild
[02:16.26]Give you a child
[02:18.83]Give you the silence that only comes
[02:20.45]When two people understand each other Family
[02:22.92]That I chose now that I see your brother as my brother
[02:27.63]Is it enough
[02:31.77]But there's robbers to the east Clowns to the West
[02:35.27]I'd give you my sunshine Give you my best
[02:38.30]But the rain is always gonna come
[02:40.58]If you're standing with me
[02:48.32]But I'm a fire and I'll keep your brittle heart warm
[02:51.62]If your cascade ocean wave blues come
[02:54.78]All these people think love's for show But I would die for you in secret
[02:59.98]The devil's in the details But you got a friend in me
[03:07.09]Would it be enough
[03:08.31]If I could never give you peace
[03:13.39]Would it be enough
[03:14.72]If I could never give you peace
[03:19.64]Would it be enough
[03:21.11]If I could never give you peace
data.trans:
[ti:peace (Explicit)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:folklore]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.06]//
[00:02.12]//
[00:03.19]//
[00:03.81]//
[00:04.22]//
[00:05.57]//
[00:06.91]//
[00:07.94]//
[00:08.97]//
[00:10.41]//
[00:42.43]我们的青葱年华这般稍纵即逝
[00:45.07]
[00:45.96]转眼就来到这个夏天 显而易见
[00:49.06]我从未鼓起勇气 为了信仰坚定不移
[00:52.68]只要危险临近
[00:55.81]它正伺机而动 亲爱的
[00:59.34]因为它就在我心中藏匿
[01:02.21]不 我永远给不了你安宁
[01:13.99]但我是一团火 会将你脆弱的心温暖包裹
[01:17.40]在你的悲伤似浪涛汹涌而来的时候
[01:20.64]这些人都觉得爱就是作秀
[01:22.66]但我愿意为了你 悄无声息地死去
[01:25.52]一步一步小心翼翼
[01:27.42]但你的爱时刻守护着我
[01:32.70]你是否依然可以满足
[01:33.94]如果我永远给不了你平静
[01:39.87]你的正直衬得我越发渺小
[01:43.29]你将梦境绘制在墙上
[01:46.92]我只顾着跟朋友说些闲言碎语
[01:49.24]我这样好像玷污了你一身荣光
[02:03.71]你知道我会
[02:07.82]与你携手跨过那重重阻碍
[02:10.98]与你一起在战壕并肩战斗
[02:14.68]给你我的野性
[02:16.26]给你一个小孩
[02:18.83]给你我宝贵的沉默
[02:20.45]只有彼此心心相印时才会有 家庭
[02:22.92]是我的选择 既然我已与你的兄弟情同手足
[02:27.63]你是否满足
[02:31.77]但是东有蛮横匪徒 西有恐怖小丑
[02:35.27]我会给你我的阳光 给你我最美好的事物
[02:38.30]可倾盆大雨总会落下
[02:40.58]只要你与我并肩而立
[02:48.32]但我是一团火 将你脆弱的心温暖包裹
[02:51.62]在你的悲伤似浪涛汹涌而来的时候
[02:54.78]这些人都觉得爱就是作秀 但我愿意为了你 悄无声息地死去
[02:59.98]一步一步小心翼翼 但你的爱时刻守护着我
[03:07.09]你是否依然可以满足
[03:08.31]如果我永远给不了你平静
[03:13.39]你是否依然可以满足
[03:14.72]如果我永远给不了你平静
[03:19.64]你是否依然可以满足
[03:21.11]如果我永远给不了你平静
